mapper.select: select substr(menu_name,0,5) as menu_cate, substr(menu_name,6) as menu_name, menu_price, store_note from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and substr(menu_name,0,5) = (select substr(menu_name,0,5) as menu_cate from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and rownum <= 1)

select substr(menu_name,0,5) as menu_cate, max(rowid), to_number(max(substr(menu_code,(instr(menu_code,'M')+1)))) as menu_code from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' group by substr(menu_name,0,5) order by menu_code

select substr(menu_name,0,5) as menu_cate, substr(menu_name,6) as menu_name, menu_price, store_note from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%' and substr(menu_name,0,5) like #{menu_cate}
select nvl(max(menu_name),'not') as menu_name from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%'
mapper.insert: insert into store_menu values(#{license_number} || 'M' || (select max(substr(menu_code,-1))+1 as menu_code from store_menu where menu_code like #{license_number} || '%'), #{menu_cate} || ' ' || #{menu_name}, #{menu_price}, #{store_note})
